title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Lacombe Lake Park – St. Albert, AB, Canada
content:
Photo submitted by Dean Anderson, “I was riding my daily commute and the full wolf moon was out in all of it’s glory. My fat bike is in the shop so I am riding my wife’s Surly Moonlander, ‘Fatniss Everdeen’, pink accents and all. It was a cool morning where the temperature was about -29C…so […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Lacombe Lake Park – St. Albert, AB, Canada appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
